about.title: About HRPM
about.subtitle: Non-profit investigative platform
about.missionText: To protect and advocate for fundamental human rights through investigative intelligence and verified documentation.
about.missionDesc1: Many individuals face legal persecution, harassment, and institutional abuse without the resources to fight back. Evidence is scattered, timelines are obscured, and patterns of misconduct remain hidden.
about.missionDesc2: HRPM exists to change that. We build comprehensive case files that synthesize documents, testimonies, and evidence into actionable intelligence—bringing clarity to complex situations and accountability to those who abuse their power.
about.visionText: A world where justice is accessible to all and human rights violations are exposed and addressed.

helpList.item2: Families torn apart by institutional failures

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide our work and define our commitment to human rights.
values.justiceDesc: We believe every person deserves fair treatment under the law, regardless of their resources or status.
values.protectionDesc: Safeguarding fundamental human rights through documentation, advocacy, and public awareness.
values.transparencyDesc: Building comprehensive evidence repositories that bring procedural failures to light.
values.solidarityDesc: Standing with individuals and families facing institutional abuse and systemic injustice.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Our platform provides tools and resources to document, analyze, and expose injustice.

items.item1: Document and analyze cases of human rights violations and legal abuse
items.item2: Build transparent evidence repositories accessible to the public
items.item3: Identify patterns of procedural failures across institutions
items.item4: Support individuals navigating complex legal systems
items.item5: Advocate for systemic reforms to protect fundamental rights
items.item6: Connect victims with resources, legal aid, and support networks

caseFile.title: Case File #001: The Thanvi Investigation
caseFile.description: Our inaugural investigation documents a multi-year pattern of harassment, business interference, and legal abuse targeting an individual and their family in Denmark. Built from 123 sources, this case file demonstrates how institutional failures can devastate lives—and why transparency matters.
caseFile.exploreNote: Explore the timeline, evidence matrix, and entity network above

about.footerNote: HRPM is a non-profit initiative. We do not provide legal advice. All case documentation is based on primary sources and is presented for public interest, research, and advocacy purposes.
